tool_description: Collects real-time and historical data from HVAC sensors including temperature, humidity, pressure, and airflow measurements across specified time ranges and sensor locations.

sensor_ids.description: List of sensor identifiers to collect data from

start_time.description: Start time for data collection in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: End time for data collection in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps.
Sensor not found: One or more sensor_ids are not recognized in the system.
Data interval invalid: Use one of [1min, 5min, 15min, 1hour].
Time range too large: Maximum allowed range is 1 year for intervals less than 1 hour.
usage: Provide sensor_ids array, start_time, end_time, and optionally data_interval. The tool returns timestamped sensor readings for analysis.

timestamps.description: Array of ISO 8601 timestamps for each data point

sensor_data.description: Array of sensor readings corresponding to timestamps

sensor_types.description: Array indicating sensor type for each reading (temperature, humidity, pressure, airflow)
